project_descr: Support the priority of the Government of Southern Sudan (GOSS) on implementation of the CPA and peaceful resolution of conflicts through the creation of an enabling environment for the promotion and protection of human rights and the rule of law

outputs.output_descr: The project aims to enhance capacity of Police hrough training and campaigns as well provide logistical support to the Prisons on sewage management hence promoting sanitation of Prisons in Southern Sudan.
donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME

outputs.output_descr: Provision of training and organizational development for the Police across Southern Sudan.

This project aims to support the priority of the government on implementation of the CPA and peaceful resolution of conflicts in Southern Sudan through supporting training and organizational development of the Correction Services in Southern Sudan.
